mapper.sql: sn, odrno, ans, surveyfk, useridfk, classnofk, title, bogi1, bogi2, bogi3, bogi4, bogi5, svname, stuname, userid, elsname, tutorid, stime, etime, kojobcode, utjobcode, callername, email, schclass, utpsn, protitle, tutorname,type1
mapper.select:
SELECT userid,stuname,surveyfk,svname,title,odrno,ans,
IF( ans = '1',CONCAT ( bogi1,'(O)' ),bogi1) bogi1, IF( ans = '2',CONCAT ( bogi2,'(O)' ),bogi2) bogi2, IF( ans = '3',CONCAT ( bogi3,'(O)' ),bogi3) bogi3, IF( ans = '4',CONCAT ( bogi4,'(O)' ),bogi4) bogi4, IF( ans = '5',CONCAT ( bogi5,'(O)' ),bogi5) bogi5,type1
FROM vwsvyresult WHERE surveyfk=#{surveyfk,jdbcType=INTEGER} and useridfk = #{useridfk,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and classnofk = #{classnofk,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by surveyfk,odrno

SELECT classnofk,surveyfk,svname,title,odrno,
bogi1, bogi2, bogi3, bogi4, bogi5,
bogi1t, bogi2t, bogi3t, bogi4t, bogi5t,
totalbogi,
round(bogi1 / totalbogi * 100) per1, round(bogi2 / totalbogi * 100) per2, round(bogi3 / totalbogi * 100) per3, round(bogi4 / totalbogi * 100) per4, round(bogi5 / totalbogi * 100) per5, ans,TYPE1
FROM ( SELECT classnofk,surveyfk,svname,title,odrno,
bogi1 bogi1t, bogi2 bogi2t, bogi3 bogi3t, bogi4 bogi4t, bogi5 bogi5t,
sum(IF( ans = '1',1,0)) bogi1, sum(IF( ans = '2',1,0)) bogi2, sum(IF( ans = '3',1,0)) bogi3, sum(IF( ans = '4',1,0)) bogi4, sum(IF( ans = '5',1,0)) bogi5,
( sum(IF( ans = '1',1,0)) + sum(IF( ans = '2',1,0)) + sum(IF( ans = '3',1,0)) + sum(IF( ans = '4',1,0)) + sum(IF( ans = '5',1,0)) ) totalbogi, ans,TYPE1
FROM vwsvyresult GROUP BY classnofk,surveyfk,odrno ) z WHERE
surveyfk=#{surveyfk,jdbcType=INTEGER} and classnofk = #{classnofk,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT DISTINCT svname FROM vwsvyresult ORDER BY svname

select
distinct
from vwsvyresult
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into vwsvyresult (sn, odrno, ans, surveyfk, useridfk, classnofk, title, bogi1, bogi2, bogi3, bogi4, bogi5, svname, stuname, userid, elsname, tutorid, stime, etime, kojobcode, utjobcode, callername, email, schclass, utpsn, protitle, tutorname ) values (#{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{odrno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ans,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surveyfk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useridfk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classnofk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bogi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bogi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bogi3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bogi4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bogi5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tutorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kojobcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{utjobcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schclass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{utpsn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{protitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tutorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

odrno,
ans,

mapper.update:
update vwsvyresult
sn = #{record.sn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
odrno = #{record.odrno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ans = #{record.ans,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
surveyfk = #{record.surveyfk,jdbcType=INTEGER},
useridfk = #{record.useridfk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classnofk = #{record.classnofk,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi1 = #{record.bogi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi2 = #{record.bogi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi3 = #{record.bogi3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi4 = #{record.bogi4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi5 = #{record.bogi5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
svname = #{record.svname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stuname = #{record.stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userid = #{record.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
elsname = #{record.elsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tutorid = #{record.tutorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stime = #{record.stime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
etime = #{record.etime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kojobcode = #{record.kojobcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
utjobcode = #{record.utjobcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
callername = #{record.callername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
schclass = #{record.schclass,jdbcType=INTEGER},
utpsn = #{record.utpsn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
protitle = #{record.protitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tutorname = #{record.tutorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update vwsvyresult set sn = #{record.sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, odrno = #{record.odrno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ans = #{record.ans,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surveyfk = #{record.surveyfk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, useridfk = #{record.useridfk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classnofk = #{record.classnofk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bogi1 = #{record.bogi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bogi2 = #{record.bogi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bogi3 = #{record.bogi3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bogi4 = #{record.bogi4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bogi5 = #{record.bogi5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, svname = #{record.svname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuname = #{record.stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{record.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, elsname = #{record.elsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tutorid = #{record.tutorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stime = #{record.stime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, etime = #{record.etime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kojobcode = #{record.kojobcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, utjobcode = #{record.utjobcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, callername = #{record.callername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schclass = #{record.schclass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, utpsn = #{record.utpsn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, protitle = #{record.protitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tutorname = #{record.tutorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
